name: FantasyFlash
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to daily updates from your favorite fantasy football source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" to hear the latest from the Yards Per Fantasy team. You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

Find Yards Per Fantasy at YardsPerFantasy.com or on the Yards Per Fantasy mobile app!
